trends: There has been one other sighting in Junction City
There were no other sightings in Junction City on or around April 8th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: late last cummer or early fall, i went out to the end of the driveway to smoke a cigarette and look at the stars (which are plentiful in north-central wisconsin). my young sons came over to join me and to enjoy the evening. i happened to look over toward the house when i started to scream to the boys and point to an object moving from east to west over the house. it was an opaque flying object shaped somewhere betweem a triangle and a boomerang. when i per se, but you could see it move across the sky as it magnified the starfield in the background somewhat like what a magnifying glass would do if you laid it on a map an moved it around. although it is impossible to estimate it s size, i estimate as a referrence that it was the size of my thumb held out at arms length.
